analysis.description:
HHLCTOKEN.allowed (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#62-65) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- allowance (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#202-209)

HHLCTOKEN.transfer (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#80-177) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- privateTimes[_idx2] <= block.timestamp && block.timestamp < privateTimes[_idx2 + 1] (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#105-131)
	- block.timestamp > privateTimes[privateTimes.length - 1] (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#116-131)
	- block.timestamp < airdropTimes[0] (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#151-162)
	- airdropTimes[_idx2] <= block.timestamp && block.timestamp <= airdropTimes[_idx2 + 1] (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#134-162)
	- block.timestamp > airdropTimes[airdropTimes.length - 1] (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#146-162)
	- block.timestamp < privateTimes[0] (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#121-131)
ERC20Token.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/26/0x4ddb35479b04c207c5d87c1b53d8aba7625f5b16.sol#45-46) should be declared external
